700826f-a.text:
Crotona Ave. (left), north from E. 189th Street. IDn the left
background is Fordham Hospital.
May 12, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

700827f-a.text:
2481 Crotona Avenue, at the N.W. corner of E. 189th Street.
May 12, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

700829f-a.title: Bronx: Crotona Park - 189th Street (East)
700829f-a.text:
(1) and (2).
Crotona Park (Bronx): Shown, in a set of two views, is a new stadium built by the Works Progress Administration.
November 3, 1937
W.P.A.Photo.
Five Boroughs Project
